creator: sergeyli@pisem.net
text: mod_util_ldap will only set "protocol version 3" LDAP option if TLS is requested, but it may be necessary to set this option after every bind operation. The following patch has been tested and works in production since 2.0.41, with OpenLDAP version 2.1.x.
Patch applied to v2.0.45-dev and v2.1.0-dev.
creator: minfrin@sharp.fm
